description: This course goes over the essentials of Health Care Reform as explained by a Radiologist that has been serving the radiology community for over 35 years. Not only does he go over each key facet of the Affordable Care Act, but he breaks it down so that people can understand what they are getting exactly. He also goes on to explain what could essentially make Health Care Reform better in adding small tidbits that he has experienced as a doctor for over 35 years.
title: HealthCare Reform Principles
